concerten.title: Rock Wechter
concerten.description: Rock Wechter is een gerenomeerd muziekfestival dat jaarlijks plaatsvindt in Wechter, België

concerten.title: Pukkelpop
concerten.description: Pukkelpop is een gerenomeerd muziekfestival dat jaarlijks plaatsvindt in Kiewit, België

concerten.title: Gent Jazz Festival
concerten.description: Een jaarlijks jazzfestival dat plaatsvindt in de historische stad Gent, bekend om zijn eclectische line-up.

concerten.title: Graspop Metal Meeting
concerten.description: Een van de grootste heavy metal festivals in Europa, dat jaarlijks duizenden metal liefhebbers naar België trekt.

concerten.title: Glastonbury Festival
concerten.description: Glastonbury is one of the largest and most iconic music festivals in the world, featuring a diverse lineup of artists.

concerten.title: Coachella
concerten.description: Coachella is a renowned music and arts festival in California known for its star-studded lineups and performances.

concerten.title: Roskilde Festival
concerten.description: Roskilde is one of the largest music festivals in Europe, known for its diverse lineup and focus on  responsibility.

concerten.title: Reading and Leeds Festivals
concerten.description: Reading and Leeds are twin festivals held simultaneously, featuring a mix of rock, alternative, and indie music.

concerten.title: Sziget Festival
concerten.description: Sziget is a multicultural music and arts festival held on an island in the heart of Budapest.

concerten.title: Tomorrowland Winter
concerten.description: Experience the magic of Tomorrowland in the snowy landscapes of the Alps during the winter edition.

concerten.title: Tomorrowland Around the World
concerten.description: Join the global celebration of electronic dance music with Tomorrowland's virtual experience.

concerten.title: Rock Werchter Boutique
concerten.description: Rock Werchter Boutique brings the best of rock music to a special boutique edition in Belgium.

concerten.title: Primavera Sound
concerten.description: Primavera Sound is a renowned music festival featuring a diverse lineup of pop and indie artists.

concerten.title: Wireless Festival
concerten.description: Wireless Festival showcases the best of hip hop and R&B music in the heart of London.
